description: Defines best practices for SEO optimization in the project.

rules.name: Heading Structure
rules.description: Use semantic heading elements (`h1` for main titles, `h2-h5` for subsections).

rules.name: Metadata
rules.description: All pages should include meta tags using `next-seo`.

rules.name: Image Optimization
rules.description: Use Next.js Image component (`next/image`) for all images.
